ext_weather.name: Tonight
ext_weather.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 2am. Cloudy. Low around 34, with temperatures rising to around 40 overnight. North wind 5 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.
